Helga Jiang

About

Hi there! I'm a designer and illustrator passionate about shipping meaningful experiences.
I'm currently a Product Design Intern at MailChimp. I've previously worked at Shopify.

When I'm not designing, I run a YouTube channel featuring polymer clay and DIY tutorials and wrote a book about it too!

See my résumé and some of my work below.
